p: Overall, these Cameroonian plants are also traditionally used to control populations of arthropod pests [ 38, 39, 40]. In this research, we shed light on the growth inhibitory potential of the essential oils obtained from the leaves of A. indica, A. daniellii, and C. anisata; the seeds of A. melegueta and D. cinerea; and the roots of E. giganteus against T. brucei TC221. Selected pure constituents from the above mentioned essential oils were also evaluated.
